title: Start
body:
Mouse: So, how was your day?
[[It's been alright. What about yours?|Art]]
[[Well, my test subject has started talking to me, so I think I may be going crazy.|Talk about it]]

title: Art
body:
It's been the same as always. I wake up, get put in here, and get zapped trying to learn this maze for a while. Eventually I'll go back to my cage and eat the pellets they leave for me. Sometimes I enjoy making them into sculptures of lab equipment, even if it reminds me of being zapped all the time. I rather like art, though. Do you like art?
[[Yes, I enjoy art|Neat]]
[[Not sure, actually.|Nope]]

title: Talk about it
body:
I've been there too. Do you want to talk about it?
[[This is all just very weird to me|Weird]]
[[No, I don't.|Awkward]]

title: Neat
body: Oh, cool! Art is just great ...I'd better get back to work, but we'll talk later!

title: Nope
body: That's okay. It's not everyone's wheel of cheese. I've got to get back to work now, but it was nice talking to you!

title: Weird
body: That's okay. Sometimes life is weird. Well, anyway, back to running!

title: Awkward
body: Oh. Well, back to running, then.
